lead_paragraph: SOLOWAY--Michael, "Mickey," on January 2, 2016. Loving husband to Loretta and father to Spencer (Alex). His smile and sense of humor will be missed by all who had the joy of knowing him. Services today, Monday, 12:45pm, at "The Riverside," 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3
